source.83ae049e:
#Code by Aristotle609 https://www.kaggle.com/aristotle609/eda-on-medium-search-dataset/notebook

def plot_maker(cat_feature):
    plot = alt.Chart(df).mark_bar().encode(
        y = cat_feature,
        x = "count()"
    ).interactive()
    return plot
source.af579add:
##Code by Taha07  https://www.kaggle.com/taha07/data-scientists-jobs-analysis-visualization/notebook

from wordcloud import WordCloud
from wordcloud import STOPWORDS
stopwords = set(STOPWORDS)
wordcloud = WordCloud(background_color = 'white',
                      height =2000,
                      width = 2000                      
                     ).generate(str(df["indicator"]))
plt.figure(figsize=(12,8),facecolor='r')
plt.axis("off")
plt.imshow(wordcloud)
plt.title("Pensions Indicators")
plt.tight_layout(pad=0)
plt.show()

source.9a74bbf4:
#What age is considered your golden years?

The Third Age is now considered by many to be the “golden years” of adulthood. It is generally defined as the span of time between retirement and the beginning of age-imposed physical, emotional, and cognitive limitations, and today would roughly fall between the ages of 65 and 80+.

http://calbooming.sdsu.edu/documents/TheThirdAge.pdf
